pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Calm Oasis Spa HOME ABOUT SERVICES PORTFOLIO BLOG Privacy Policy Welcome to Calm Oasis Spa. We are committed to safeguarding the privacy of our website visitors and service users. This privacy policy explains how we handle your personal data. Information We Collect We may collect and process the following data about you: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number, etc.) that you provide by filling in forms on our website. Details of your visits to our website and the resources that you access, including, but not limited to, traffic data, location data, weblogs, and other communication data. Information provided to us when you communicate with us for any reason. How We Use Your Information We use the information that we collect from you to provide our services to you. In addition to this, we may use the information for one or more of the following purposes: To provide information to you that you request from us relating to our products or services. To provide information to you relating to other products that may be of interest to you. Such additional information will only be provided where you have consented to receive such information. To inform you of any changes to our website, services, or goods and products. Storing Your Personal Data We take all reasonable steps to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this privacy policy. Unfortunately, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure and therefore we cannot guarantee the security of data sent to us electronically and the transmission of such data is therefore entirely at your own risk. Where we have given you (or where you have chosen) a password so that you can access certain parts of our site, you are responsible for keeping this password confidential. Disclosing Your Information We will not disclose your personal information to any other party other than in accordance with this privacy policy and in the circumstances detailed below: In the event that we sell any or all of our business to the buyer. Where we are legally required by law to disclose your personal information. To further fraud protection and reduce the risk of fraud. Third Party Links You may find links to third-party websites on our website. These websites should have their own privacy policies which you should check. We do not accept any responsibility or liability for their policies whatsoever as we have no control over them. Access to Information The Data Protection Act 1998 gives you the right to access the information that we hold about you. Please note that any demand for access may be subject to payment of a fee which covers our costs in providing you with the data requested. Should you wish to receive details that we hold about you please contact us using the contact details below. Contacting Us We welcome any queries, comments, or requests you may have regarding this policy. Please do not hesitate to contact us at calmoasisspa@gmail.com. Your Consent By using our site, you consent to our website privacy policy. Changes to Our Privacy Policy We may update this policy from time to time by posting a new version on our website. You should check this page occasionally to ensure you are happy with any changes. ©. All rights reserved. Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
pages.services: Our Services - Calm Oasis Spa HOME ABOUT SERVICES PORTFOLIO BLOG Services HOME > SERVICES Explore Our Massage Services Swedish Massage Experience a rejuvenating facial session that keeps your skin healthy and glowing. We offer the best treatments to keep you looking young and fresh. Learn More Deep Tissue Massage Our spa offers a luxurious escape in New York City, providing full-service treatments to melt away stress and rejuvenate your body. Learn More Hot Stones Therapy Promote health and well-being with our superior treatments and safe spaces. Our team is dedicated to enhancing your overall wellness. Learn More Aromatherapy Massage Immerse yourself in the soothing scents and calming techniques of our aromatherapy massage, designed to relax your mind and body. Learn More Thai Massage Experience the unique and invigorating techniques of Thai massage, which combines yoga-like stretching and deep massage to improve flexibility and relieve tension. Learn More Reflexology Revitalize your body through reflexology, which focuses on pressure points in the feet to promote overall health and well-being. Learn More Gift cards GIFT CERTIFICATES We provide the gift of relaxation and beauty. Our gift certificates can be used for any service including massages, haircuts, pedicures, facial treatments, and more. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Calm Oasis Spa HOME ABOUT SERVICES PORTFOLIO BLOG Terms and Conditions Welcome to Calm Oasis Spa. Indemnification You hereby indemnify to the fullest extent Calm Oasis Spa from and against any and/or all liabilities, costs, demands, causes of action, damages, and expenses arising in any way related to your breach of any of the provisions of these terms. Severability If any provision of these terms is found to be invalid under any applicable law, such provisions shall be deleted without affecting the remaining provisions herein. Variation of Terms Calm Oasis Spa is permitted to revise these terms at any time as it sees fit, and by using this website you are expected to review these terms on a regular basis.
